title: iPhone SE Review: 5 More Years Of Yesterday
description: Sponsored by ESR. Shop ESR cases here:  and enter to win your free iPhone SE (May 2, 2020 - May 15, 2020) here:    [iPHONE SE 2020 REVIEW]  Everyones talking about how the new iPhone SE for 2020 is the "affordable iPhone" and the "only small iPhone" left in Apple's lineup  and while both those things are true, whats more interesting to me is that the new iPhone SE is a lifeline. For all those people who never wanted to give up the home button, people who never needed a bigger screen or FaceID or more cameras, but do need a new iPhone. And for them, the new iPhone SE 2020 is basically perfect. Join me for MrMobile's iPhone SE 2020 Review!   [SUBSCRIBE TO MRMOBILE]     [ABOUT MRMOBILE'S iPHONE SE 2020 REVIEW]  MrMobile's iPhone SE 2020 Review was produced following seven days with an Apple iPhone SE 2020 review sample purchased by MrMobile/Future plc. The device was tested on T-Mobile US in Brooklyn, NY. The lone sponsor of this video is ESR Gear; neither Apple nor any other company paid a fee or otherwise offered compensation in exchange for this coverage.   [PRODUCTS IN THIS VIDEO]  Carved Qi Wireless Charger [Carved]:   Nomad Walnut Wireless Charging Hub [Amazon]:    [LINKS]  iPhone SE 2020 Review [Rene Ritchie]:   iPhone SE 2020 Review [iMore]:   iPhone SE 2020 Review: Old is New, Again! [Android Authority]:   Here's how long Apple supports older iPhone models [iMore]:   iPhone 6S Review [Pocketnow]:   Apple Store Seen Growing to 600 Locations by 2023 [Apple Insider]:    [SOCIALIZE]        [DISCLOSURES]  This post may contain affiliate links, which afford MrMobile / Future plc a commission if you make a purchase. See our affiliate link policy for more details:   Additional information concerning MrMobiles ethics policy can be found here:   #iphonese #iphonese2020 #iphone #iphone9 #apple
